item.title: GoToSocial - ready for Prime Time?
item.description:
GoToSocial - ready for Prime Time?

Short answer: Hell yes.

After completing the full migration and running in production for weeks, I can confidently say GoToSocial is ready for serious use.

Perfect For: ‚úÖ

  • Self-hosters with limited resources (VPS with 1-2GB RAM? No problem!)
  • Single-user or small family instances (works great up to ~50 users based on
item.content:encoded:
GoToSocial - ready for Prime Time?

Short answer: Hell yes.

After completing the full migration and running in production for weeks, I can confidently say GoToSocial is ready for serious use.

Perfect For: ‚úÖ

  • Self-hosters with limited resources (VPS with 1-2GB RAM? No problem!)
  • Single-user or small family instances (works great up to ~50 users based on

item.title: Open Notebook
item.description:
Open Notebook

An open source, privacy-focused alternative to Google’s Notebook LM. Why give Google more of our data when we can take control of our own research workflows?
item.content:encoded:
Open Notebook

An open source, privacy-focused alternative to Google’s Notebook LM. Why give Google more of our data when we can take control of our own research workflows?

item.title: Chess.com API in a Python package
item.description:
Chess.com API in a Python package

Python client for Chess.com API, which provides public data from chess.com website.

item.title: n8n Cheat Sheet
item.description:
n8n Cheat Sheet

Everything you need: triggers, nodes, expressions, API requests, AI agents, Docker self-hosting, and shortcuts, all in one place.

item.title: TaxHacker
item.description:
TaxHacker

Self-hosted AI accounting app. LLM analyzer for receipts, invoices, transactions with custom prompts and categories
Hmmm, looks like Manager now has a contender. I just wish it has api endpoints and robust documentation. But I can query the Postgres database anyway, right?
item.content:encoded:
TaxHacker

Self-hosted AI accounting app. LLM analyzer for receipts, invoices, transactions with custom prompts and categories
Hmmm, looks like Manager now has a contender. I just wish it has api endpoints and robust documentation. But I can query the Postgres database anyway, right?

item.title: Portracker
item.description:
Portracker

By auto-discovering services on your systems, portracker provides a live, accurate map of your network. It helps eliminate manual tracking in spreadsheets and prevents deployment failures caused by port conflicts.
item.content:encoded:
Portracker

By auto-discovering services on your systems, portracker provides a live, accurate map of your network. It helps eliminate manual tracking in spreadsheets and prevents deployment failures caused by port conflicts.
